name: 36 Days of Type || L // Lockheed (12/36)
description: For this year's 36 Days of Type, I will be putting out cards in the style of the 1994 X-Men Collectors cards. I couldn't resist doing a card for Lockheed, the alien dragon and often companion of Kitty Pryde, who was yesterday's card. Lockheed makes sporadic minor appearances in X-Men related animated television series and made his live-action debut in the 2020 film The New Mutants.
